name: Forsworn Marauder

aspects.high_concept: Fierce Reachman Warrior Fighting for Independence
other_aspects: Blend of Warrior and Hedge Magic

stunts: Berserker Rage: Once per scene, gain +2 to Fight for three exchanges but cannot defend (all defenses at -2)
Hedge Magic: Can cast one simple offensive spell per scene (frost, fire, or lightning bolt) using Lore instead of Fight
Ambush Training: +2 to Stealth when setting up ambushes in The Reach
notes: The Forsworn are Reachmen who violently oppose Nord rule in The Reach. They use a combination of warrior skills and hedge magic. Extremely hostile to Nords and anyone supporting them. They worship the Old Gods and consider themselves the rightful rulers of The Reach.
combat_tactics: Forsworn prefer ambushes and hit-and-run tactics. They use terrain to their advantage and coordinate attacks. Some use magic to support melee fighters. They fight fanatically for their cause and rarely surrender.
